plot: A bear wakes out of hibernation in the middle of a human society that blindly refuses to recognize him as an animal.
title: The Bear That Wasn't
plot_es: A bear wakes out of hibernation in the middle of a human society that blindly refuses to recognize him as an animal.
plot_en: A bear wakes out of hibernation in the middle of a human society that blindly refuses to recognize him as an animal.
